name: Memories (SGB)
description:
This is my first attempt at an Indie game depending on player skill level and play style you can expect up to around 10 hours playtime (unless you run from every fight!)

You will play as Simon and his cat and help them retrieve memories

The game is a maze, puzzle come jump scare horror. If it generates enough interest I will consider adding in more areas

As a warning it does contain some flashing animations during combat and certain events, consider this a forewarning

Given the horror aspect I will state parental discretion is on the buyer
